configure.file:
#!/bin/bash -x
. /etc/profile.d/sge-binaries.sh
# sets the ownership to sge user chown -R 400.400 $SGE_ROOT
# Setup QMaster cd $SGE_ROOT && \ ./inst_sge -m -auto ./util/install_modules/sge_configuration.conf
/etc/rc.d/init.d/sgemaster.`hostname -s` stop
echo "&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;.&Kickstart_PrivateDNSDomain; \ &Kickstart_PublicHostname; &Kickstart_PrivateHostname;" > \ $SGE_ROOT/$SGE_CELL/common/host_aliases
cat default/common/configuration | sed -e "s/reporting=false/reporting=true/g" -e "s/joblog=false/joblog=true/g" > /tmp/sge-default-common-config.conf mv -f /tmp/sge-default-common-config.conf default/common/configuration chown 400:400 default/common/configuration
/etc/rc.d/init.d/sgemaster.`hostname -s` start
# add default MPI parallel environments $SGE_ROOT/bin/$SGE_ARCH/qconf -Ap $SGE_ROOT/mpi/rocks-mpich.template \ >> /dev/null 2>&1 $SGE_ROOT/bin/$SGE_ARCH/qconf -Ap $SGE_ROOT/mpi/rocks-mpi.template \ >> /dev/null 2>&1 $SGE_ROOT/bin/$SGE_ARCH/qconf -Ap $SGE_ROOT/mpi/rocks-ompi.template \ >> /dev/null 2>&1
# add this node as a submit host $SGE_ROOT/bin/$SGE_ARCH/qconf -as `/bin/hostname --fqdn` \ >> /dev/null 2>&1
# add mpich mpi openmpi to all.q pe list $SGE_ROOT/bin/$SGE_ARCH/qconf -rattr queue pe_list 'make mpich mpi orte' all.q \ >> /dev/null 2>&1
# # call 'rocks sync config' to ensure all the sge clients are properly set up # (in case the restore roll was supplied # /opt/rocks/bin/rocks sync config
rm /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-01-sge-qmaster

kickstart.configure: # if Kickstart_PrivateHostname changes Kickstart_PublicHostname_old will # change as well, so let's test the latter if [ "&Kickstart_PublicHostname_old;" ]; then /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-01-sge-qmaster else #we should not reconfigure sge rm /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-01-sge-qmaster fi
